This report the sample correlation, DEG numbers
```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
library(dplyr)
library(tibble)
library(ggplot2)
library(kableExtra)

# Load the data
sample_data <- read.table(params$summary_table,sep="\t",header=T)
colnames(sample_data) <- c("sample","raw read pairs#","clean read pairs#","mapping ratio%","unique mapping read pairs#")

sample_data$`unique mapping read pairs#` <- format(as.numeric(sample_data$`unique mapping read pairs#`),big.mark=",")

# Generate HTML table with embedded images
kable(sample_data, escape = FALSE,format = "html") %>%
  kable_styling("striped", full_width = FALSE)
```

Sample pearson corrlataion heatmap based on FPKM normalized expression value
```{r,out.width="50%"}
knitr::include_graphics(params$corr_plot)
```
